name: Shape Hex Fit
description:
Shape Hex Fit is very easy to play and pleasurable game for all ages. All you have to do is just tap and move blocks to fill up the square and collect block pieces to level up!

How to play:
- Drag the blocks to move them.
- Try to fit them all in the frame
- Blocks can't be rotated.
- Use HINT to help you solve the puzzles
- No time limits. You can stay as long as you want.
